## üë®‚ÄçüöÄ A little bit about me [Perfectly Safe to Skip]

- My name is Muhammad Mahmoud. I'm from Luxor, Egypt üá™üá¨ (We'll love to have you there, we have like 2/3 of the world's monuments and much more cool stuff.)
- I have a BSc in Electrical Engineering from Aswan University üéì. My graduation project was in digital design field. We designed & implemented a RISC-V ISA on FPGA boards.
- I discoverd that I really like the field of front-end devolpment üíª. I liked the idea of being able to build websites that work perfectly on mobiles, desktops, laptops or any other thing with a screen and a cpu.
- I'm a Madridista, a gamer and I like music (especially rap, Eminem = üêê).
